title: UBS Issues World’s First Publicly Traded Digital Bond
dc:creator: Retail Asia
description:
read the original version on: www.retailnews.asia

UBS launches the world’s first digital bond that can be traded on both blockchain-based and traditional exchanges. UBS is issuing a digital bond for the first time. With a volume of more than 375 million Swiss francs ($371 million), the security can be traded on both traditional exchanges and as a digital bond on the […]

The post UBS Issues World’s First Publicly Traded Digital Bond appeared first on Retail News Asia.
